properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
TWO VESSELS, 165 AND 45 PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 34-18N 013-15E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 590 84527, 3906 590 84409,
FAX: 3906 592 2737, 3906 590 84793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
